changeSet.comment: Initialize several tables with VN-specific values

changeSet.author: jsibley
changeSet.comment: Initialize test catalog related tables with VN-specific values

changeSet.author: jsibley
changeSet.comment: Adds sample label printing options to site_information

column.name: description
column.value: Configuration options for sample label printing

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include accession numbers on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the accession number on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include specimen collection date on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the collection date on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include specimen collection time on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the collection time on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient ID on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient ID on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include national ID on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the national ID on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient medical record number on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient MRN on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient name on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient name on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient date of birth on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient DOB on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient age on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient age on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include patient gender on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient gender on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include lab section(s) where specimen processed on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the lab section(s) on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include specimen type on the master labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the specimen type on the master labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: If true, show sample item print label fields/buttons.

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include accession number on the sample item labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the accession number on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include specimen collection date on the sample item labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the collection date on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

column.name: description
column.value: Whether or not to include specimen collection time on the specimen labels.

column.value: The prefix to print before the collection time on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

column.value: Whether or not to include patient ID on the specimen labels.

column.name: description
column.value: The prefix to print before the patient ID on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

column.value: Whether or not to include national ID on the specimen labels.

column.value: The prefix to print before the national ID on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

column.value: The prefix to print before the patient MRN on the specimen labels (120 characters max.).

changeSet.author: jsibley
changeSet.comment: Set the sample entry autocomplete configuration options

column.name: description
column.value: If true, use an autocomplete field for sample type. Otherwise, use a drop-down list. [Sample entry modal version only]

column.name: description
column.value: If true, use an autocomplete field for sample source. Otherwise, use a drop-down list. [Sample entry modal version only]

column.name: description
column.value: If true, display the sample source field on the sample entry screen. [Sample entry modal version only]

changeSet.author: jsibley
changeSet.comment: Adds the module for batch entry to Intake role

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_role where name = 'Intake' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'QuickEntry' )

changeSet.author: jsibley
changeSet.comment: Adds the module for sample label printing to Intake role

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_role where name = 'Intake' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from system_module where name = 'SampleLabelPrint' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.menu where element_id = 'menu_sample' )
